name: Federazione Italiana dell'Industria Alimentare
goal: Federalimentare represents the Italian Food and drink Industry
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: The main EU initiatives that envolve Federalimentare are Regulation 1169/2011 and FOPNL and food labeling
